alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 3:53AM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Also, dangerously cold wind chills down to around 20 degrees below zero. * WHERE...Russell and Lincoln Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Dangerously cold wind chills will result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
